![Black Dress](https://ae-pic-a1.aliexpress-media.com/kf/S72613a438235478e93a87bfd33b0bf8fR.jpg)

This isn't your average LBD. This Black V-Neck Sleeveless Double Breasted A-Line Tank Dress is serving up some serious style: 

* **Flattering A-line silhouette:** Hugs in all the right places and flows beautifully. Trust me, it looks amazing on every body type!
* **Double-breasted detail:** Adds a touch of sophistication and makes it look way more expensive than it is (wink wink). 
* **Versatile style:** Dress it up with heels and a statement necklace for a night out, or keep it casual with sandals and a denim jacket. 

I actually wore this dress to a friend's birthday brunch last weekend, and the compliments were endless! Everyone kept asking where I got it.
